price: Say, “I do not ask you for any reward for it, except that anyone who wishes to take a path to his Lord[32].”
arabic: قُلۡ مَآ أَسۡـَٔلُكُمۡ عَلَيۡهِ مِنۡ أَجۡرٍ إِلَّا مَن شَآءَ أَن يَتَّخِذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ سَبِيلٗا
footnotes: [32] By spending in the way of Allah.
